thread.section_title: Texaselectricrates Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Texaselectricrates | texaselectricrates.com
thread.title: Richard Cook

author: Richard Cook
title: Richard Cook
text:
We gave them the utility company we had now that is expiring soon. We wanted a similar plan. They showed us a great 12 month plan with 6.9 fixed rate. Thanks. We then decided to sign up and switch our Utility service to 4 Change Utility upon the date of our expiring other utility service. We then got a confirmation email from 4 Change Utility that they would take care of everything with switching our service next month on the date we gave them and we did not need to contact the other company.
Thanks.
